title: Nifty IT index slips 5%; Infosys, Tech Mahindra, LTTS, Wipro down over 5% - Business Standard
content: Nifty IT index slips 5%; Infosys, Tech Mahindra, LTTS, Wipro down over 5%  Business Standard
description: The deterioration of the US corporate sector profitability would lead to tighter IT spending
